BinaryTree.summary: The BinaryTree class presents the generic Binary Search Tree that stores different types of grades. Contains methods for inserting new node, displaying the nodes and serializing the tree.
BinaryTree.typeparam: The type of the value of the grade.

Root.value: Gets or sets the root of the Binary Search Tree.

Find.summary: Searches for the specified grade in the current tree.
Find.returns: The specified grade if the current tree contains it, otherwise, null.

DisplayTree.summary: Displays the current Binary Search Tree.

Serialize.summary: Serializes the current Binary Search Tree to the specified XML file.
Serialize.param: The file to write the current tree.

Deserialize.summary: Deserializes a Binary Search Tree object from the specified XML file.
Deserialize.param: The file that contains a BinaryTree object.

Node.summary: The Node nested class presents a node of a Binary Search Tree.

LeftNode.value: Gets or sets the left node of the current node.

RightNode.value: Gets or sets the right node of the current node.

Grades.value: The collection of grades that have the same value.
